general.legal_google_play_notice: Google Play and the Google Play logo are trademarks of Google LLC.
general.app_description:
Beercules is the ultimate drinking game for you.
 Whether to pre-drink or to get the party started. With over 60 cards, you will have the best evening of your life.

landing_view.best_app_slogan: The best party game since party games existed!

review1.reviewText:
The best drinking game,
except for Rage Cage 😜

review2.reviewText:
Makes a lot of fun
 and is always with me.

review3.reviewText:
Except for the headache
 a great game

customize_view.restoredDefault: The amount of each card was reset to the default!
customize_view.title: My cards

rules_view.title: How to
rules_view.rule_1_description: All players sit in a circle.
rules_view.rule_2_description: One player starts taking a card by swiping it away. He reads the instruction out aloud and follows it.
rules_view.rule_3_description: After completing the cards action, it's your neighbor's turn.

continue.question: You still have {cards_amount} cards left. Do you want to continue playing with the cards?

finish.question: Would you like to play another round?

DECKEL_DRAUF.title: Lid on it
DECKEL_DRAUF.description:
At some point secretly lay your flat hand on your glass. All players must quickly put their hands on their glass as well.
The slowest and last player gets punished.

Forget your task, and you get punished twice.

EISPRINZESSIN.title: Ice Princess
EISPRINZESSIN.description:
At some point, freeze your movement secretly. All players must now freeze immediately.
The slowest and last player gets punished.

Forget your task, and you get punished twice.

OHREN_SPITZEN.title: Listen carefully
OHREN_SPITZEN.description:
At some point hold your earlobe secretly. All players must now also hold their earlobes.
The slowest and last player gets punished.

Forget your task, and you get punished twice.

HAENDE_HOCH.title: Hands up
HAENDE_HOCH.description:
At some point raise your two hands. All players must now also raise their hands quickly.
The slowest and last player gets punished.

Forget your task, and you get punished twice.

BEER_LOVE.title: Beer Love
BEER_LOVE.description:
Love you dearly with your glass.
The first one who notices, decides who gets punished

ICH_HAB_NOCH_NIE.title: Never have I ever
ICH_HAB_NOCH_NIE.description:
You say something you have never done.
All those who have already done it get punished.

EIN_GESCHENK_VON_HERZEN.title: A gift
EIN_GESCHENK_VON_HERZEN.description:
Someone gets punished.
You choose who.

DREI_GESCHENKE_VON_HERZEN.title: Three gifts
DREI_GESCHENKE_VON_HERZEN.description:
You must give away three punishments.
You can also give them to yourself.

OPFERGLAS.title: Victims glass
OPFERGLAS.description: You fill up the victim glass with a sip of your drink.

OPFERGLAS_LAST.title: Victims glass
OPFERGLAS_LAST.description:
The last victim glass!

You must drink the whole glass now.

SCHERE_STEIN_PAAR_BIER.title: Rock, paper, beer
SCHERE_STEIN_PAAR_BIER.description:
Choose a player who will play rock paper scissor against you.
The loser gets punished.

TAUSCHRAUSCH.title: Replacements
TAUSCHRAUSCH.description:
Choose two players who will swap the drink for one round.
It can be you, too.

ICH_PACKE_MEINEN_KOFFER.title: I pack my suitcase
ICH_PACKE_MEINEN_KOFFER.description:
You play "I pack my suitcase".
You start and the loser gets punished.

FILMRISS.title: Blackout
FILMRISS.description:
Name the last 3 cards in the correct order. Can you make it, all get punished, except for you.
You can not make it? You get punished.

FRAGENKOENIG.title: Questionking
FRAGENKOENIG.description: You are the Questionking. Ask as many questions as possible to the other players. No matter which. As soon as they answer they get punished. You stay Questionking until someone new becomes Questionking.

TRINK_BUDDY.title: Party Buddy
TRINK_BUDDY.description:
Choose a player who always gets punished when you get punished and vice versa.
You remain buddies throughout the whole game.

Of course you can also have several buddies.

BIERGOTT.title: Beer God
BIERGOTT.description:
Imagine a new basic rule, like the other basic rules that apply throughout the whole game.
Whoever breaks the rule gets punished.

In addition, it may not be for or against specific players (groups), but must apply to all.

REIMSCHWEIN.title: Rhyme time
REIMSCHWEIN.description:
You choose a word that needs to be rhymed in a clockwise direction.
Whoever repeats a word, makes a mistake or does not know anymore after 10 seconds, gets punished.

ALLE_FUER_EINEN.title: All for one …
ALLE_FUER_EINEN.description: At some point during the game, you can skip a punishment, and all of your teammates get punished.

AUFZAEHLUNG.title: Enumeration
AUFZAEHLUNG.description:
You choose a topic and start a list. If you repeat something or do not remember anything after 10 seconds, you get punished.

Suggestions: (car brands, former presidents …)

ABSTIMMUNG.title: Poll
ABSTIMMUNG.description: You choose a topic to vote (A or B). The loser side gets punished. In case of a tie everybody gets punished.

_1_2_3_BIER.title: 1, 2, X, 4
_1_2_3_BIER.description:
You name a number between 1 and 10. You now count up in a clockwise direction. For each number divisible by the selected one or where the selected one appears, the player must say "Beercules" instead of the number.
You're done when someone makes a mistake.
The one who made the mistake gets punished twice.

KNUTSCHKARTE.title: Suck it
KNUTSCHKARTE.description:
Take a business card or similar. and only pass it on by mouth. Your neighbor must now suck it and pass it directly to his neighbor.
The two players who drop it, get punished.

RICHTUNGSWECHSEL.title: Change of direction
RICHTUNGSWECHSEL.description:
Take a break.
Only change direction and you get punished.

KETTENREAKTION.title: Chain reaction
KETTENREAKTION.description:
Everyone is starting to drink.
Only when the first one has emptied his glass his right neighbor stop can stop.
Then his right neighbor, and so on.

SPIEGLEIN_SPIEGLEIN.title: Mirror Mirror
SPIEGLEIN_SPIEGLEIN.description: Decide who is the best looking one. He / she gets punished. If you do not agree, all get punished.

SING_NO_SONG.title: Sing no song
SING_NO_SONG.description: From now on no song can be sung or rocked with. Who breaks the rule, drinks one.

BASIC_RULE_1.title: SHUT UP
BASIC_RULE_1.description:
There must be no curse words oder insults said or shown.

This rule applies throughout the game. Who breaks it, gets punished

BASIC_RULE_2.title: LEFTY RIGHTY
BASIC_RULE_2.description:
You always have to drink with your left hand Left-handers drink with the right hand.

This rule applies throughout the game. Who breaks it, gets punished

BASIC_RULE_3.title: DON'T SAY IT
BASIC_RULE_3.description:
You can not say the word "drink", drunk etc.

This rule applies throughout the game. Who breaks it, gets punished
